text: "Sister Christian" is a 1984 song by American hard rock band Night Ranger and is the second single from their second studio album Midnight Madness. It went to number 5 in the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 99 in Australia and number 67 in Germany. It was the group's biggest hit of their career. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Arena rock songs
title: Sister Christian
